screen_desc: The screenshot shows search results for "good Indian restaurants" in a maps application. It displays two restaurant listings: "Hyderabad Dum Biryani" (4.4 stars, 0.7 miles away) and "Mantra India - Mountain View" (4.0 stars, 2.0 miles away), along with images of their food and interiors. Each listing includes ratings, distance, cuisine type, address, closing time, and a brief review. There are interactive options to order food, reserve a table, call, or get directions. The top of the screen has filter options like "Top rated," "Indian," "Dine-in," and more.
